price: ߞߏ߫ ߊ߲ ߧߋ߫ ߤߙߊ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߞߊߟߌߦߊ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ، ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ߟߊߡߊ߬ ߟߋ߬
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
